summary: Food ordering app where the Order page is the first/home page (menu removed from first page).

existing_features.title: Change the default route so that navigating to '/' redirects to '/order' instead of '/menu'.
Remove the 'Menu' tab/link from the bottom navigation bar (Navigation.tsx) so only 'Order' and 'Reports' tabs are visible.

Keep the Menu Management page ('/menu') accessible to admin users via a route, but do not expose it in the main navigation. Admin users may access it through the app header or another admin-only entry point if one exists.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove menu from the first page and make Order the first/home page
